InfoScreen.Name: blood_pressure__info
InfoScreen.Text: Your activities Now we are going to ask you a couple of questions about your activities in the past 24 hours.

ChoiceQuestion.Name: bp_act_1
ChoiceQuestion.Text: Did you have coffee, espresso, or another beverage containing caffeine in the past 24 hours?

Label.Text: If yes, how many hours ago
No, I did not have any caffeine
If yes, how many hours ago
No, I did not have anything to eat today

TextQuestion.Name: bp_act_3
TextQuestion.Text: What did you eat at that time?

ChoiceQuestion.Name: bp_act_4
ChoiceQuestion.Text: Have you consumed any alcohol, including beer, wine, liquor, or other alcoholic beverages?

Label.Text: If yes, how many hours ago
No, I did not have any alcohol

ChoiceQuestion.Name: bp_act_5
ChoiceQuestion.Text: When was the last time that you exercised?

Label.Text: I did not exercise in the last week

TextQuestion.Name: bp_act_6
TextQuestion.Text: What type of exercise have you done

ChoiceQuestion.Name: bp_act_7
ChoiceQuestion.Text: Do you smoke cigarettes or use any other form of tobacco?

TextQuestion.Name: bp_act_8
TextQuestion.Text: How many hours ago did you smoke or used tobacco?

ChoiceQuestion.Name: bp_act_9
ChoiceQuestion.Text: Have you taken any medication for cold or flu symptoms today?

ChoiceQuestion.Name: bp_act_11
ChoiceQuestion.Text: Have you taken any anti-inflammatory medication today? These include ibuprofen (e.g. Advil/Motrin), naproxen (e.g. Alleve), aspirin, or other prescription or over-the-counter medications.
